tool_description: Search or lookup streaming options for movies and tv-shows
name: Where can I watch
title: Where can I watch

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for streaming options for movies and series in various countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://where-can-i-watch1.p.rapidapi.com/search/uk/back to the future"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "where-can-i-watch1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://where-can-i-watch1.p.rapidapi.com/search/{country}/{title}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "where-can-i-watch1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Lookup title
api_list.description: Lookup streaming options for a specific movie or series in various countries

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Type is either movie or series

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description:
If you do not get any results try and put spaces between each letter like

M A S H

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://where-can-i-watch1.p.rapidapi.com/uk/movie/cars"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "where-can-i-watch1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://where-can-i-watch1.p.rapidapi.com/{country}/{type}/{title}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "where-can-i-watch1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
